publication.title: Corpus Linguistics for Establishing The Natural Language Content of Digital Library Documents
publication.keyword: Authoring Tool;Corpus Linguistic;Digital Library;Indexation;kolmogorov complexity;Natural Language;Query Expansion;Syntactic Analysis;
publication.abstract: Digital Libraries will hold huge amounts of text and other forms of information. For the collections to be maximally useful, they must be highly organized with useful indexes and intra- and inter-document linkages. This brings with it a demand for ever-better methods for automated analysis of text to build the indexes and links. It requires turning implicit information, "encrypted in

publication.jconf: Conference on Information Security and Cryptology

publication.title: Integrity Improvements to an RFID Privacy Protection Protocol for Anti-counterfeiting
Securing the Pharmaceutical Supply Chain using RFID
publication.abstract: RFID technology has been applied to a number of ap- plications. In (5), a protocol was described how to apply RFID to currency to provide integrity (e.g. reduce coun- terfeiting) while simultaneously supporting privacy. In this paper we discuss how RFID can be applied to increase integrity in the pharmaceutical supply chain. A secured pharmaceutical supply chain will increase integrity,

An Anti-Counterfeiting RFID Privacy Protection Protocol
